name: Full Moon
description: The full moon will be visible all night.

name: Summer Solstice
description: The summer solstice is the longest day of the year in the Northern Hemisphere.

name: Capricornids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Capricornids meteor shower peaks tonight. Up to 5 meteors per hour.

name: Perseid Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Perseid meteor shower, one of the best of the year, peaks tonight.

name: Full Moon
description: The full moon will be visible all night.

name: Autumn Equinox
description: The autumn equinox: day and night are nearly the same length.

name: Partial Lunar Eclipse
description: A partial lunar eclipse is visible from much of Europe, Africa, and Asia.

name: Draconids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Draconids meteor shower peaks tonight. Best seen in the early evening.

name: Orionids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Orionids meteor shower peaks, with up to 20 meteors per hour.

name: Full Moon
description: The full moon will be visible all night.

name: Taurids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Taurids meteor shower peaks. Sometimes produces bright fireballs.

name: Leonids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Leonids meteor shower peaks tonight.

name: Full Moon
description: The full moon will be visible all night.

name: Geminids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Geminids, one of the best meteor showers, peaks tonight.

name: Winter Solstice
description: The winter solstice is the shortest day of the year in the Northern Hemisphere.

name: Ursids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Ursids meteor shower peaks with up to 10 meteors per hour.

name: Full Moon
description: The full moon will be visible all night.

name: Quadrantids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Quadrantids meteor shower peaks, with up to 40 meteors per hour.

name: Full Moon
description: The full moon will be visible all night.

name: Vernal Equinox
description: The vernal equinox marks the start of spring in the Northern Hemisphere.

name: Lyrids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Lyrids meteor shower peaks tonight.

name: Eta Aquarids Meteor Shower Peak
description: The Eta Aquarids meteor shower peaks. Best viewed before dawn.

name: Total Lunar Eclipse
description: A total lunar eclipse will be visible in much of Europe, Africa, Asia, and Australia.

name: Jupiter at Opposition
description: Jupiter is opposite the Sun in the sky, best visible all night.

name: Saturn at Opposition
description: Saturn is at opposition, shining bright in the night sky.

name: Full Moon
description: The full moon will be visible all night.

name: Partial Solar Eclipse
description: A partial solar eclipse is visible in parts of the Northern Hemisphere.

name: Full Moon
description: The full moon will be visible all night.
